| Retrace|U.S. Retrace]] (2000)
}} 'Hybrids ' is a 1999 remix album by The Creatures, aka singer Siouxsie Sioux
and percussionist Budgie. The songs are remixes of their songs recorded between
1998 and early 1999.

Most of the songs are extended mixes. Several had been previously released on
12" promo singles, cd singles but some are completely remade.

[[The Independent on Sunday]] noted that some remixes were made by different
acts : "This is the pick of a crop that includes Howie B., Witchman and The
Beloved, plus newer artists such as Icarus or Dr Psyche. While there are some
chunky beats and catchy loops, it's better suited to home listening rather than
the dancefloor". "Hybrids by The Creatures [album review]". The Independent
on Sunday. November 1999.

[[Q (magazine)]]'s Victoria Segal said : "So Howie B takes a knife to the
sexually watchful 'Prettiest Thing'; Black Dog unbolt the beats of 'Guillotine'
into disjunctive abstraction, and Witchman has his evil way with 'Say'. Twice.
Running its finger along the cutting edge, Hybrids is a bravely bloody genetic
experiment." "Hybrids by The Creatures [album review]". Q Magazine. November
1999.
